name: EDITION #1 â€“ double-sided poster magazine + 7-inch vinyl record
description: Printed in the UK as a strictly limited run of 500 copies, on 115gsm uncoated matt paper, the latest edition of RubberDuckMag is available as a double-sided A1 (594mm x 841mm) poster-magazine: hand-numbered and folded. As well as over 9000-words in mono on one side, the exclusive full-colour illustration on the reverse features an exciting (invisible) smart-phone trigger that plays our very own rap video on your phone, simply by pointing your app-enabled-device at the illustration... You will also receive an exclusive cover-mounted 7-inch vinyl record release of 'Easy For You' from Mike Baker The Bike Maker, produced by Vinroc. {CLICK FOR A PREVIEW}
